value:
Good thing you wear white. I grew
up hating dark clothing. Like,
really, really hating!$k$pSo if you ever catch me making
a scary face, that's probably
what's on my mind.

I'm Lord Takumi's retainer. He's so
strong, beautiful, noble... *sigh*
Couldn't be happier to serve him.

I heard you're not equipped to enter
battle. No problem. I'll use my lance to
protect you. Need to keep you safe!

I'm curious what the fashions are
like in this realm. Let's go find a tailor
shop or clothing store sometime!

So, you were summoned here
suddenly too? I bet you don't have
a change of clothes.$k$pI'll make you something!

Oh, I really like your style!
By any chance, are you
$Nu?$k$pI'm here to say hello from
$Nf!
Now that makes a statement!
One step at a time!

Sorry. That didn't make me look
very good.

For all my talk of fashion, it's
what's inside that counts.

My name is Oboro. I'm a spear
fighter from Hoshido—and a pretty
great tailor, if I say so myself!

Oh, is something wrong,
$Nu?$k$pYou haven't ruined your nice clothes,
have you? Or ripped a stitch? Or
spilled soup on yourself?$k$pOh, I'm only kidding. I know you
come around for more than
my needle and thread.$k$pYou know, I do like it when I see
you in your nice, clean uniform.
It's so dapper!$k$pI like it even more when you don't
get blood all over it—means you've
come back safe from battle!$k$pClothes can always be replaced,
but you're one of a kind. I just
couldn't do without you.$k$pSo I promise to always protect
you...and to help you keep your
uniform in top shape!
どう？
せいやぁ！
ひゃっ！
My clothes!
Oh, that's it!
You're gonna need stitches.
I'll tear a hole in you!
Coming through!
What...?
Haha
Oh, did you need something?
The clothing you and your friends wear here is very stylish. Impressed!
I love to make clothing when I'm off duty. So, I'd kill for some good fabric. Have any?
You would not believe the scary face I make when I get really, really angry!
I'm particular about my clothes. But when it's time to fight...? I get dressed in a flash!
Oh, Lord Takumi... Where are you? I should be with you!
I like to keep my stitching abilities in top shape. So I'll mend everyone's clothing after battle!
OK.
Ready.
Do my best.
